awd_titl_txt: Development and Evaluation of a Novel Precursor to Boron    Nitride
awd_abstract_narration: 9411757  Economy    This proposal is for research on exploring the fabrication and  mechanical properties of Carbon/Boron Nitride (C/BN).  The proposed  work focusses on:  a)  nature of the liquid crystalline state of  borazine oligomers, b) simplified process of borazine oligomers for  advanced composites, c) nature of C/BN interface, and d) new  methodology for preparing borazine.  The composites may have better  mechanical properties and the improved oxidation resistance  temperature up to 850C. The proposed research will explore method  to prepare borazine with a cost effective procedure.    %%%%    Light weight and of better mechanical and oxidation resistance  temperature composites of Carbon/Boron Nitride will be developed  and evaluated in the proposed work.  Such composites, if produced  successfully, will be useful in electronic industry and have  potential use in light weight components for high temperature/  mechanical applications.  ***
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
